translation.en: Jake, finally.
Oh! Eileen, hello! I thought you were my brother.
translation.de: Oh! Eileen, hallo! Ich hielt Sie für meinen Bruder.

translation.en: Is Jake making you do all the work again?
translation.de: Lässt Jake dich wieder alles machen?

translation.en: Oh, no.
Jake has been banned from the kitchen since junior high
translation.de: Jake wurde seit der Junior High aus der Küche verbannt,

translation.en: when he almost burned it down making gumdrops.
He enjoys the operational side. You can't overboil numbers.
translation.de: Er mag das Organisatorische. Zahlen kochen nie über.

translation.en: No, you can't.
I'll have my usual.
Okay, three mint meltaways.
Oh! And here is a salted coconut caramel buttercream for you to try.
translation.de: Und probieren Sie das gesalzene Kokusnuss-Buttercreme-Karamell.

translation.en: -Ooh! You are a dear. -You're gonna like that.
translation.de: -Sie sind ein Schatz. -Sie werden es lieben.

translation.en: Oh! I also need to pre-order two boxes of toffee for my grandson.
translation.de: Ich muss außerdem zwei Schachteln Toffee für meinen Enkel bestellen.

translation.en: Okay.
Two boxes, you got it.
-[register chimes] -When does Megan get home?
I was hoping for Winterfest,
but she's studying in Luxembourg so probably not till summer.
translation.de: aber sie studiert in Luxemburg. Sommer wohl erst.

translation.en: What a smart world traveler you've raised.
She didn't get it from me. I am such a homebody.
translation.de: Von mir hat sie das nicht. Ich bin eine Stubenhockerin.

translation.en: See you next week.
-Don't forget your chocolate. -Ooh! Thanks.
-You're late. -Sorry, ma'am.
-Come on! -Sorry.
I know, I'm late getting this to you, but I was talking to Ophelia--
translation.de: Ich weiß, ich komme spät, aber ich sprach mit Ophelia…

translation.en: It's okay, I'm just glad you're here.
translation.de: Schon gut. Du bist ja hier.

translation.en: We have so much to do before Winterfest and I…
translation.de: Es steht noch so viel an vor dem Fest, und ich…

translation.en: Jake, are you all right? Oh, great.
-Yeah, but, um… -But what?
Hey, are you free for dinner tonight?
translation.de: Gehst du mit mir zu Abend essen?

translation.en: Should I be worried? No, not really.
That's not reassuring.
How about 7:30?
Kerrie, Jake, hello, hello.
-Hi. -How is everything?
It is delicious as always. Thank you, Adam.
-You outdid yourself with the crab cakes. -I'm glad you like it.
I still need to come by and place my candy order for Winterfest.
translation.de: Ich muss noch meine Süßes-Bestellung fürs Winterfest machen.

translation.en: Is Alexandra working this week?
I believe she is.
Great.
-Enjoy your meals. -Thank you.
So, not that I don't enjoy being treated to dinner by my big brother,
translation.de: Ok, ich werde ja gerne von meinem großen Bruder eingeladen,

translation.en: but can you please tell me what's going on right now?
translation.de: aber würdest du mir jetzt sagen, was los ist?

translation.en: Okay.
So…
Ophelia got offered her dream job teaching English literature in London.
translation.de: Ophelia erhielt ihr Traumjobangebot als Englisch-Dozentin in London.

translation.en: She's beyond ecstatic.
I couldn't be happier for her.
translation.de: Ich freue mich riesig für sie.

translation.en: Jake, that's fantastic!
You are such a supportive husband.
translation.de: Du bist so ein guter Ehemann.

translation.en: It's too bad Ophelia couldn't be with us tonight to celebrate.
translation.de: Schade, dass Ophelia heute nicht mit uns feiert.

translation.en: And how perfect that London is less than a 30-minute drive from here.
translation.de: Und perfekt, dass London nur 30 Minuten entfernt ist.

translation.en: Not London, Ohio.
Silchester University. She accepted a job in England?
translation.de: -Silchester University. -Sie nahm einen Job in England an?

translation.en: One of their professors left unexpectedly so Ophelia flew out early this morning.
translation.de: Ein Professor ging unerwartet, also flog Ophelia heute hin.

translation.en: She wanted to tell you herself, but there wasn't time.
translation.de: Sie wollte es dir wirklich selbst sagen.

translation.en: I can't… What about the store? I can't run it alone.
translation.de: Ich… Was ist mit dem Laden? Alleine schaffe ich das nicht.

translation.en: Especially with Winterfest coming up.
There aren't enough hours in the day for me to do everything myself.
translation.de: Der Tag ist zu kurz, alles alleine zu schaffen.

translation.en: That's what I wanted to talk to you about.
translation.de: Darüber wollte ich mit dir reden.

translation.en: I've been thinking about long-term solutions,
and the best one might be for me to sell my half of the business.
translation.de: und am besten verkaufe ich meine Firmenhälfte.

translation.en: I'm sorry, I know how you feel about change,
translation.de: Tut mir leid. Du magst keine Veränderungen,

translation.en: and this is a lot of news all at once.
But, in a major stroke of luck for both of us,
there's an interested buyer who we both already know.
translation.de: es gibt einen Interessenten, den wir beide kennen.

translation.en: -Who? -Brooks McLead.
Wait, what?
He's a financial genius and extremely successful entrepreneur.
translation.de: Er ist Finanzgenie und ein erfolgreicher Unternehmer.

translation.en: It's a gift that he wants to buy into our family shop.
translation.de: Es ist ein Geschenk, dass er sich einkaufen will.

translation.en: -No, not happening. -Why not?
Because I remember what he was like in high school, that's why not.
translation.de: Ich weiß noch, wie er in der High School war. Deshalb.

translation.en: Kerrie, that was a long time ago.
Look, I'm going to be in the UK for the next five years and…
translation.de: Hör zu, ich bin die nächsten fünf Jahre in England…

translation.en: Five years?
Gosh, Jake, I'm really gonna miss you.
translation.de: Gott, Jake, du wirst mir fehlen.

translation.en: You should come with us. We'd love to have you.
translation.de: Komm mit. Wir würden uns riesig freuen.

translation.en: I mean, you've lived your entire life in Bedford. We could sell the shop.
translation.de: Du hast immer nur in Bedford gelebt. Wir verkaufen den Laden.

translation.en: Every memory I have of Mom and Dad and Nanny and Pop
translation.de: Alle meine Erinnerungen an Mom, Dad, Oma und Opa

translation.en: center around the shop.
Mom and Nanny taught me how to pour the candy molds.
translation.de: Mom und Oma zeigten mir, wie man Bonbons macht.

translation.en: You painted the sign outside with Pop.
translation.de: Du hast mit Opa das Schild gemalt.

translation.en: It's our family's legacy, it's our history.
translation.de: Er ist unser Familienerbe, unsere Geschichte.

translation.en: This is my home, Jake.
Listen, I know that Brooks wasn't your favorite person back then.
translation.de: Ich weiß, Brooks war damals nicht gerade deine Lieblingsperson.

translation.en: That's an understatement.
But he's incredibly competent, smart, trustworthy.
translation.de: Aber er ist extrem kompetent, clever, vertrauenswürdig.

translation.en: And his businesses always double or triple their profits.
translation.de: Und seine Firmen verdoppeln oder verdreifachen immer die Profite.

translation.en: I want you to have a nice nest egg to retire on one day.
translation.de: Ich möchte, dass du genug für deine Rente zurücklegen kannst.

translation.en: I can't believe I'm saying this, but…
translation.de: Ich fasse nicht, dass ich das jetzt sage, aber…

translation.en: okay.
You can sell your half of the store to Brooks McLead.
translation.de: Verkauf deinen Firmenanteil an Brooks McLead.

translation.en: You won't regret this.
How are you settling in? Eh, better than the last place.
translation.de: -Lebst du dich gut ein? -Besser als vorher.

translation.en: Why can't your next venture be in Hawaii or Florida?
translation.de: Mach doch mal in Hawaii oder Florida Geschäfte.

translation.en: Yeah? You can move us there?
Brooks, whatever happened to that job in Silicon Valley?
translation.de: Brooks, was ist mit dem Job im Silicon Valley passiert?

translation.en: -Check. -Turned it down.
After everything that happened in New York, I thought… just wanted a quieter life.
translation.de: Nach der Sache in New York… wollte ich es etwas ruhiger.

translation.en: The Bay Area retirement community,
they had ocean views
and they offered surfing excursions.
-Just no comparison. -Sorry, Dad.
translation.de: -Und sieh nur hier. -Tut mir leid, Dad.

translation.en: Listen, you know you can always move in with me if you'd like. -You don't have to live here. -Oh!
translation.de: Du kannst jederzeit bei mir einziehen. Du musst nicht hier leben.

translation.en: Does your house have luxurious amenities,
decadent dining, daily activities,
an organized social events calendar?
That's a really good point. I should move in here instead.
translation.de: Gutes Argument. Ich sollte hier einziehen.

translation.en: What, and cramp my style? I don't think so.
That's it, check.
You know, I'm just hoping that one day, you'll just settle down permanently.
translation.de: Ich hoffe nur, dass du dich irgendwann mal niederlässt.

translation.en: I'm not gonna be around forever to take care of you.
translation.de: Ich kann mich nicht ewig um dich kümmern.

translation.en: I tried it, Dad, didn't work.
Sierra wasn't the right one for you.
Could have let me know that earlier, would have saved me a lot of grief.
translation.de: Hättest du mir es früher gesagt, hätte es mir Leid erspart.

translation.en: You wouldn't have listened, you're too stubborn.
translation.de: Du hörtest nicht und warst zu stur.

translation.en: You always will try to learn it the hard way.
translation.de: Du willst es immer auf die harte Tour lernen.

translation.en: Thanks, Dad.
Checkmate.
-Rematch? -No, I gotta go.
I gotta sign papers with the lawyer and Jake.
translation.de: Papiere unterzeichnen mit dem Anwalt und Jake.

translation.en: Rain check?
Yeah.
I love you, Dad.
I love you too, son.
I can't believe Jake and Ophelia are moving to England.
translation.de: Unfassbar, dass Jake und Ophelia nach England ziehen.

translation.en: I know. And the timing couldn't be worse, with Winterfest coming up.
translation.de: Ja. Und so kurz vorm Winterfest, das Timing ist mies.

translation.en: I haven't even told Megan. I don't want her to worry.
translation.de: Ich sagte Megan nichts, damit sie sich nicht sorgt.

translation.en: I just want her to enjoy her semester abroad.
You're such a good mom.
Thanks. And thank you for coming on board full time.
translation.de: Danke. Und dass du jetzt Vollzeit arbeitest.

translation.en: We are going to be working around the clock to get all this done.
translation.de: Wir müssen durchschuften, um alles zu schaffen.

translation.en: [Alexandra] I am happy to help.
One of our biggest events and we already have more orders than last year.
translation.de: Wir haben schon mehr Bestellungen als letztes Jahr.

translation.en: And less than two weeks to fill them. And I will gladly pay you double overtime.
translation.de: Und nur zwei Wochen Zeit. Ich zahle dir gerne das Doppelte.

translation.en: That's very generous. So, when does your new business partner start?
translation.de: Wie großzügig. Wann kommt dein neuer Geschäftspartner?

translation.en: Oh, they're signing the paperwork right now.
I'm so glad this worked out.
I'm really excited to be a part of it. Perfect timing too.
translation.de: Ich freue mich auch. Das Timing ist auch perfekt.

translation.en: You sure you're not going to miss the city?
translation.de: Wird dir die Stadt nicht fehlen?

translation.en: No. I'm through with it there. Looking for a change of scenery now.
translation.de: Nein. Das ist vorbei. Ich will einen Tapetenwechsel.

translation.en: Yeah.
Now this is taken care of, you wanna get a drink, celebrate?
translation.de: Da alles geregelt ist, wie wäre ein Drink zur Feier?

translation.en: Yeah, yeah. It's got to be quick. I need to get back for the movers.
translation.de: Ja, aber schnell. Die Umzugsleute kommen bald.

translation.en: -Oh, you're coming tonight? -Yeah, of course.
That reminds me, I still need to place my candy order.
translation.de: Stimmt, ich muss noch meine Bestellung machen.

translation.en: For you or your customers?
For my customers, of course.
Unless I eat them all first.
translation.de: Falls ich es nicht vorher esse.

translation.en: -Which is what usually happens. -Can't say I blame you.
[sighs] I'm surprised Brooks isn't here yet.
translation.de: Komisch, dass Brooks nicht da ist.

translation.en: You invited him tonight?
No, you can just forward any of my mail to my new address in Ohio.
translation.de: Nein, sende all meine Post an meine neue Adresse in Ohio.

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah, I hope I made the right decision too.
translation.de: Ja. Ich hoffe auch, es ist die richtige Entscheidung.

translation.en: Okay.
-Hey! -Brooks, I'm glad you made it.
Thanks for having me. I got you something.
translation.de: Danke für die Einladung. Hier, für dich.

translation.en: I think I'm gonna appreciate this more than I know.
translation.de: Das werde ich sehr zu schätzen wissen.

translation.en: I heard they only drink the tea over there, matey.
translation.de: Sie sollen da nur Tee schlürfen, Kumpel.

translation.en: Oh, hey, you remember my sister, Kerrie? Your new business partner.
translation.de: Kennst du noch meine Schwester Kerrie? Deine neue Geschäftspartnerin.

translation.en: -Hi. -[Brooks] Hi.
-Long time. -Long time.
It's nice to see you again, Bean.
Can I talk to you outside?
-Yeah, sure. -Excuse us.
Yeah, see you soon.
I've changed my mind about the partnership.
All he did was walk in the door.
He called me Bean!
Well, I mean, you did fail miserably at your attempt
to create a jalapeño hot sauce jellybean.
Oh, come on, you know that was my experimental candy phase!
translation.de: Ich bitte dich, das waren nur Experimente.

translation.en: I know. I think I still have a hole in the roof of my mouth from it.
translation.de: Ja. Mein Mund ist immer noch löchrig davon.

translation.en: That man made my life miserable in high school.
translation.de: Dieser Mann machte mir mein Schulleben schwer.

translation.en: It'll be better if I take a home equity loan and do everything myself.
translation.de: Ich übernehme den Firmenkredit und mache alles alleine.

translation.en: That man uprooted his life to move here to help us.
translation.de: Dieser Mann zog nur her, um uns zu helfen.

translation.en: But if you really want me to, I'll ask him to nullify the contract
translation.de: Aber wenn du es wirklich willst, annulliere ich den Vertrag

translation.en: and I'll refund him the payment.
What about that little cottage you were thinking about buying?
translation.de: Und das Cottage, das du kaufen wolltest?

translation.en: Don't worry about that.
There are other places that Ophelia and I can rent.
translation.de: Ophelia und ich können was anderes anmieten.

translation.en: Kerrie, I didn't want you to be financially strapped by taking out a loan.
translation.de: Kerrie, du solltest an keinen Kredit gebunden sein.

translation.en: That's why I thought Brooks was the perfect solution for both of us.
translation.de: Daher sah ich Brooks als die beste Lösung für uns beide an.

translation.en: But we'll figure something else out.
Okay. Okay, I might be overreacting.
It's probably just the shock of seeing him again.
translation.de: Sicher bin ich nur geschockt, ihn wiederzusehen.

translation.en: But you're right, high school was a long time ago.
translation.de: Du hast recht, die Schule ist ewig her.

translation.en: I'll give it a try. But if it doesn't work out…
translation.de: Ich versuche es. Aber wenn es nicht funktioniert…

translation.en: Then you can take out that home equity loan
translation.de: Dann nimmst du den Firmenkredit auf

translation.en: and you can buy him out.
If it doesn't work out, I will. It's a good thing you're moving so far away.
translation.de: Das werde ich dann tun. Zum Glück ziehst du so weit weg.

translation.en: -You will thank me for this one day. -Don't count on it.
Come on, let's go back in and enjoy
this wonderful going-away party that you organized for me.
translation.de: diese tolle Abschiedsparty, die du organisiert hast.

translation.en: Fine.
I can't believe Brooks McLead is my business partner.
translation.de: Brooks McLead ist mein Geschäftspartner, unfassbar.

translation.en: -Have you heard from Jake? -Oh, yeah.
He arrived safely and he's getting settled into their new place.
translation.de: Er kam sicher an und richtet sich ein.

translation.en: -So far, they love Silchester. -Good.
So how do you know Brooks again?
translation.de: Woher kennst du Brooks noch mal?

translation.en: High school. He and Jake were two years ahead of me.
translation.de: High School. Er und Jake waren zwei Jahre über mir.

translation.en: Oh, you were all friends?
I wouldn't say that.
Brooks was always at our house, but he just teased me relentlessly.
translation.de: Brooks war immer bei uns, aber er hat mich nur geärgert.

translation.en: He was always picking on me.
I couldn't stand to be in the same room with him.
A bully?
No, nothing like that.
You know, he just was popular and athletic, handsome.
translation.de: Er war einfach beliebt und sportlich, gut aussehend.

translation.en: You know, that type.
I swear, I was the only girl in school that didn't treat him like royalty.
translation.de: Ich war die Einzige, die ihn nicht anbetete.

translation.en: -No wonder he liked you. -What?!
No.
Though there was that time… What?
Oh, nothing. It's such a long time ago. It's meaningless now.
translation.de: Ach nichts. Es ist ewig her. Absolut bedeutungslos.

translation.en: Okay.
It was his senior year, he was hanging out at our house waiting for Jake,
translation.de: Im Abschlussjahr wartete er bei uns auf Jake

translation.en: eating everything in the kitchen, I might add.
translation.de: und aß die Küche leer, nur so nebenbei.

translation.en: And he mentioned that he didn't have a date for the Winter Snowball Dance.
translation.de: Und er erwähnte, er hätte kein Date für den Winter-Schneeball-Ball.

translation.en: What happened?
Well, he said he would have a better time going with me
translation.de: Nun, er meinte, mit mir hätte er mehr Spaß

translation.en: than any of the other girls in school.
Okay, maybe I didn't dislike him as much as I thought I did back then.
translation.de: Ok, vielleicht hegte ich doch nicht so viel Abneigung für ihn.

translation.en: I thought he meant what he said.
I thought I was his date.
The night of the dance, he never showed up.
translation.de: Am Abend des Balls tauchte er nicht auf.

translation.en: Come to find out he took Erin Smythe, captain of the cheerleaders, instead.
translation.de: Er ging mit Erin Smythe hin, Cheerleader-Kapitänin.

translation.en: Oh, no.
Did he have any idea that you thought he'd asked you?
translation.de: War ihm bewusst, dass du es als Einladung ansahst?

translation.en: Probably not.
I don't know. I avoided talking to him after that.
translation.de: Keine Ahnung. Danach mied ich ihn.

translation.en: And then he moved after graduation.
translation.de: Nach dem Abschluss zog er dann weg.

translation.en: I'm sorry.
It must have been devastating to your sweet little teenage heart.
translation.de: Dein Teenagerherz muss gebrochen gewesen sein.

translation.en: Well, it was at the time.
Now, I just hope he remains a silent partner that stays--
translation.de: Jetzt hoffe ich, er ist nur ein stiller Partner…

translation.en: [Brooks] Hello!
Or not.
Good morning.
All right, ready to get started.
Jake used to bring me here all the time. This is like my favorite place.
translation.de: Jake nahm mich immer mit hierhin. Mein Lieblingsort.

translation.en: Your parents were always so nice to me.
translation.de: Deine Eltern waren immer so nett.

translation.en: What are you doing?
Um, I just thought I would promote some of the higher-priced products
by putting them in the customers' eyeline.
translation.de: indem ich sie auf Augenhöhe platziere.

translation.en: I'm not manipulating my customers into buying anything they don't want.
translation.de: Ich manipuliere meine Kunden nicht, ungewollte Dinge zu kaufen.

translation.en: I think you mean our customers.
I'm not interested in manipulating them either,
translation.de: Ich will sie auch nicht manipulieren,

translation.en: but they can't buy what they can't see.
translation.de: aber man kauft nur, was man sieht.

translation.en: The average shopper makes three unplanned or impulse purchases
translation.de: Der Durchschnittskäufer tätigt drei ungeplante oder Impulskäufe

translation.en: on four out of every ten store visits.
Let me guess, you're upping the odds?
translation.de: Lass mich raten, du erhöhst die Chancen?

translation.en: Exactly.
So… do you think we could move the cash register over the candy counter?
translation.de: Könnte die Kasse rüber zur Süßestheke?

translation.en: What do you know about candy making?
Absolutely nothing. Although candy is my favorite food group.
translation.de: Rein gar nichts. Obwohl sie mein Lieblingsessen sind.

translation.en: -It's a bad idea. -What's that?
Oh, I said, "I have an idea."
We need to get a raffle prize for Winterfest.
translation.de: Wir brauchen einen Tombolapreis fürs Winterfest.

translation.en: All the vendors donate something,
and then the money raised goes to the local schools' arts programs.
translation.de: und das Geld geht ans lokale Schulkunstprogramm.

translation.en: I can take care of that.
Great. Thank you.
Oh! Hello, young man. What's your name?
translation.de: Hallo, junger Mann. Wie heißt du?

translation.en: -James. -James, are you here alone?
No. My mom is shopping next door.
translation.de: Nein. Meine Mom kauft nebenan ein.

translation.en: How can I help you?
I want to get one for my mom, one for Nana, and one for Lily.
translation.de: Ich möchte eins für meine Mom, eins für Oma und eins für Lily.

translation.en: Aren't you a sweetheart! Is Lily your sister?
translation.de: Was für ein lieber Kerl. Ist Lily deine Schwester?

translation.en: No. She's my girlfriend.
She's a girl and she's my best friend.
translation.de: Sie ist ein Mädchen und meine Freundin.

translation.en: Okay, I see you have your piggybank.
translation.de: Ok, du hast dein Sparschwein dabei.

translation.en: [boy] Ten…
[Kerrie] Yeah.
Do I have enough?
You have the exact right amount.
Here you go, my friend.
And this is a little something extra for you.
translation.de: Und das ist eine Kleinigkeit für dich.

translation.en: You got everything?
All right, hang on, let me get the door for you.
translation.de: Warte, ich mache die Tür auf.

translation.en: You go straight to your mom, okay?
translation.de: Du gehst direkt zu deiner Mom, ok?

translation.en: -Thanks. Bye. -Bye, honey.
What a cutie pie!
Very cute.
Out of curiosity, how much free product do you give away each month?
translation.de: Kurze Frage: Wie viele Sachen verschenkst du pro Monat?

translation.en: -I don't know, I've never counted. -Oh.
-Is that a problem? -Uh, I hope not.
Brooks, you remember Alexandra from Jake's going-away party?
translation.de: Erinnerst du dich an Alexandra von Jakes Abschiedsparty?

translation.en: Yeah, of course. Hello. How are you?
Hi. Busy! Winterfest is ten days away.
translation.de: Hi. Beschäftigt. In zehn Tagen ist das Winterfest.

translation.en: Yeah. So glad it's still a tradition.
I have some very fun memories from Winterfest.
Oh, it gets bigger every year.
It used to be a couple of hours after the student dance,
translation.de: Früher waren es ein paar Stunden nach dem Tanz,

translation.en: now it's a full day and evening event for the entire community.
translation.de: jetzt ist es ein ganzer Tag für die Gemeinde.

translation.en: Oh! Excuse me.
Hi, honey.
Um, does she clock out to take personal calls?
Alexandra helps take care of her five-year-old niece,
translation.de: Alexandra hilft bei ihrer fünfjährigen Nichte,

translation.en: so she can take a personal call whenever she needs to
for however long she needs to without punching a clock.
translation.de: und wie lange sie will, ohne Abzüge.

translation.en: Okay, just getting to know your modus operandi.
translation.de: Ok, ich lerne erst deine Methoden kennen.

translation.en: We are a family owned and operated business.
Our M.O. is we treat everyone like family.
translation.de: Unsere Methode ist es, alle wie Familie zu behandeln.

translation.en: Good. Good to know.
Listen, are you free to get together for lunch, discuss our business plan?
translation.de: Hast du Zeit für ein Mittagessen, um unseren Geschäftsplan zu besprechen?

translation.en: Oh, I can't, I'm really busy.
translation.de: Ich kann nicht, zu viel zu tun.

translation.en: What about dinner?
You have to eat at some point of the day, don't you?
translation.de: Du musst ja irgendwann mal essen, oder?

translation.en: Okay. Dinner.
A quick dinner.
-Quick dinner. -Mm-hmm.
Great, I'll make a reservation. Anywhere you like.
translation.de: Super, ich reserviere. Du wählst aus.

translation.en: -Adam's Eatery is fine. -Okay.
Say 5 p.m.?
-Five is fine. -Excellent.
Hey, hey! Hey, sorry I'm late.
I got caught on a call for a different business venture.
translation.de: Anruf wegen eines anderen Geschäfts dauerte länger.

translation.en: I understand that happens, and it's not a problem,
translation.de: So was kann vorkommen, kein Problem.

translation.en: but any time you're gonna be 15 minutes late,
translation.de: Aber wenn du dich 15 Minuten verspätest,

translation.en: a text would be appreciated.
You're right. That was rude of me not to text you.
translation.de: Stimmt. Es war unhöflich, nicht zu schreiben.

translation.en: I apologize.
Thank you.
I don't know if you remember, but this used to be Margolita's.
translation.de: Ich weiß nicht, ob du dich erinnerst, das war Margolita's.

translation.en: Mr. and Mrs. Sanchez retired.
translation.de: Mr. und Mrs. Sanchez gingen in Rente.

translation.en: Oh, that's too bad. I like this place.
translation.de: Oh, wie schade. Ich mochte den Laden.

translation.en: -They had the best chips and salsa. -You're right, they did.
-Yeah. -Adam took over several years ago.
He is really the best chef in town.
translation.de: Er ist der beste Koch der Stadt.

translation.en: -Oh! Oh! I'm sorry. -Sorry. I got it.
Sorry. Okay, thanks.
-Ooh! -I didn't-- I got it.
[clears throat] Yeah.
-Sorry. -Yeah, that's okay.
-Is it broken? -No, all good.
-Shall we go in? -Yeah.
-Thank you. -You were right, that was delicious.
Well, I usually am. Right.
I'll be sure to keep that in mind.
Okay. I went through the shop's entire history.
translation.de: Ok. Ich ging die Geschichte des Ladens durch.

translation.en: Oh. You're thorough.
Uh-huh. Before I buy any business, I do all the research.
translation.de: Vor jedem Kauf recherchiere ich alles.

translation.en: Oh, your great grandparents, they have a very impressive history.
translation.de: Oh, die Geschichte deiner Urgroßeltern ist wirklich beeindruckend.

translation.en: Well, they did bring their candy making secrets over from Europe.
translation.de: Nun, sie brachten ihre Backgeheimnisse aus Europe hierher.

translation.en: Here's a list of things I think we should consider implementing.
translation.de: Hier ist eine Liste mit Änderungsvorschlägen.

translation.en: The business is not in trouble, but we could be doing a lot better.
translation.de: Es steckt nicht in Schwierigkeiten, aber es ginge besser.

translation.en: "Change name to Murphy & McLead Candy & Gift shop"?
translation.de: MURPHY'S CANDY PLAN "Namensänderung zu Murphy & McLead Candy & Gift Shop"?

translation.en: [chuckles] No. No, absolutely not. [laughs] You're right, that's a bad idea.
translation.de: -Nein, auf keinen Fall. -Du hast recht, miese Idee.

translation.en: I think it's important to preserve the original brand name,
not necessarily change it.
You're right.
"Create an employee handbook"?
We only have one full-time employee.
For now, but what if we expand or franchise?
translation.de: Jetzt, aber wir könnten doch expandieren?

translation.en: It's important to have everything in writing.
translation.de: Es ist wichtig, alles schriftlich festzuhalten.

translation.en: That way, there aren't a lot of miscommunications.
You're very by-the-book, aren't you?
I'm a businessman, that's what I know.
translation.de: Ich bin Unternehmer, so kenne ich es.

translation.en: Candy, good candy, makes people happy.
translation.de: Süßwaren, gute Süßwaren machen Menschen glücklich.

translation.en: That was my great grandparents' mission, and it's mine too.
translation.de: Die Mission meiner Urgroßeltern, und auch meine.

translation.en: That's what I know.
I admire that, I really do.
And my purpose is to create more profit. That's for all of our sakes.
translation.de: Und ich will mehr Profite einholen. Das kommt allen zugute.

translation.en: How is everything here?
-Oh. -Good. Fabulous, thank you.
The roast sirloin rivals anything I've ever had in New York City.
translation.de: Der Lendenbraten kann es mit jedem in New York aufnehmen.

translation.en: I'll gladly take that compliment.
Good to see you. Give Alexandra my best.
translation.de: Wie schön. Richte Alexandra Grüße aus.

translation.en: I will. [clears throat]
Well…
I thank you for dinner.
As much as I would like to stick around and discuss
translation.de: Ich würde ja liebend gerne weiter

translation.en: marketing strategies and new signage,
I need to get back to my candy molds.
translation.de: aber ich muss zurück zu den Formen.

translation.en: Because without them, we won't have a business.
translation.de: Denn sonst gibt es gar kein Geschäft.

translation.en: -Let me get the check. -Oh, no, I've got it. That's fine.
translation.de: -Ich frage nach der Rechnung. -Das übernehme ich.

translation.en: Thank you.
It's a business expense so it's a write-off.
Right.
-Hey. -Hey, morning.
You're here early.
As Ben Franklin says,
"Early to bed, early to rise, makes a man healthy, wealthy, and wise."
translation.de: "Früh zu Bett, früh auf, macht gesund, reich und weise."

translation.en: Where does that leave the artist who finds their creativity at night?
translation.de: Und was ist mit dem Künstler, der nachts Kreativität findet?

translation.en: It's a really good point.
Speaking of creativity, I want you to look at our new website.
translation.de: Apropos Kreativität, sieh dir unsere neue Website an.

translation.en: What was wrong with our old website?
translation.de: Was stimmte mit der alten nicht?

translation.en: No, nothing. I just wanted to run a few ideas by you.
translation.de: Nein, nichts. Ich wollte dir nur ein paar Ideen zeigen.

translation.en: Where's the picture of my great grandparents? It's right here, I moved it to the history page.
translation.de: -Wo ist das Foto meiner Urgroßeltern? -Hier. Auf der Geschichte-Seite.

translation.en: -You changed the logo?! -No, those are just options.
You could see them in case you liked any of them.
-You don't waste any time. -No, wasted time, wasted profit.
translation.de: -Du vergeudest keine Zeit. -Vergeudete Zeit, verschenktes Geld.

translation.en: -Did Ben Franklin say that too? -No, that was me.
I've always been partial to "don't fix what isn't broken."
translation.de: Mein Motto: "Ändere nichts, was nicht kaputt ist."

translation.en: You'd be amazed what a great website
and a strong social media presence does for a business.
translation.de: und Präsenz in den sozialen Medien bewirken Wunder.

translation.en: -We need to expand our reach. -Brooks, I don't have time for this.
translation.de: -Wir müssen bekannter werden. -Ich habe keine Zeit.

translation.en: That's what I'm here for.
Right. Okay. Anything else?
We could offer free Wi-Fi, then, after the Winterfest, open a coffee bar in here
translation.de: Gratis-WLAN. Und nach dem Winterfest vielleicht eine Kaffee-Bar,

translation.en: so people can come in and hang out.
Actually, that's not a bad idea. And a hot chocolate bar.
translation.de: Die Idee ist gar nicht so übel. Und eine Kakao-Bar.

translation.en: I've been working with this new drink called a "hot cocoa bomb."
translation.de: Ich arbeite ewig an diesem Getränk, "heiße Kakaobombe".

translation.en: [Brooks] I'm not sure we have enough space.
We might have to knock down a few walls, expand a little bit.
translation.de: Wir sollten Wände einreißen, uns erweitern.

translation.en: Maybe find new premises?
No, I'm not knocking down walls. Or moving.
translation.de: Nein, ich reiße keine Wände ein oder Umzug.

translation.en: After we expand, we have to outsource the candy-making to a factory.
translation.de: Dann müssen wir die Herstellung auslagern in eine Fabrik.

translation.en: -What? -This will be our flagship store.
If we invest in it, it's gonna be fine. This font is driving me crazy.
translation.de: Mit Investitionen wird das super. Die Schrift macht mich irre.

translation.en: Fine, you work on the font, I'm gonna open the shop.
translation.de: Gut, arbeite an der Schrift, ich öffne den Laden.

translation.en: Are you emailing Megan?
Yes. I'm filling her in on what's happening around here,
translation.de: Ja. Ich berichte ihr, was hier abgeht,

translation.en: how Brooks wants to change the name of the shop, change the logo,
translation.de: dass Brooks Ladennamen und Logo ändern will,

translation.en: knock the walls down and expand.
You know he wants to find a factory to make the candy?
translation.de: Er will die Ware in einer Fabrik herstellen.

translation.en: Yeah, he's… very enthusiastic.
And presumptuous, and as arrogant as ever.
translation.de: Und überheblich und arrogant wie eh und je.

translation.en: I told Jake I'd give this a try, but it just isn't working.
translation.de: Ich versprach Jake, es zu probieren. Aber es klappt nicht.

translation.en: Isn't it too late now?
We'll see about that.
So you own half of Murphy's Candies & Gifts.
translation.de: Ihnen gehört die Hälfte von Murphy's Candies & Gifts.

translation.en: Yes.
To make sure I'm clear, you want to buy out this new partner you told me about?
translation.de: Und Sie wollen den neuen Partner auszahlen?

translation.en: That's my plan.
And what do you have as collateral on a loan?
I don't have much savings, but I do have my family home.
translation.de: Ich habe kaum Ersparnisse, aber mein Familienhaus.

translation.en: My parents put it in my name before they passed.
I'm sorry for your loss.
-And the house is fully paid off? -Yes.
I wanted to inquire about a home equity loan.
translation.de: Ich wollte nach einer Firmenhypothek fragen.

translation.en: I always recommend a home equity loan over using your house as collateral.
translation.de: Die ist immer besser als das Haus als Sicherheit.

translation.en: You have a solid credit rating and no debt.
Let me see what I can do, and hopefully he won't be your partner much longer.
translation.de: Ich sehe, was ich tun kann, damit er nicht länger Ihr Partner bleibt.

translation.en: I'm really sorry, but your ex-husband didn't sign a quitclaim.
You're gonna have to get him to sign one to clear the title.
translation.de: Sie müssen ihn vorher dazu bringen.

translation.en: Oh, no, I thought he signed that.
translation.de: Oh nein. Ich nahm an, er unterschrieb.

translation.en: Well, that's gonna take some time.
According to my daughter, he's in some remote part of Mexico
translation.de: Laut meiner Tochter arbeitet er die nächsten sechs Monate

translation.en: working for the next six months.
Oh, no!
This means I'm stuck with that obnoxious, controlling, egoist
translation.de: Also habe ich diesen widerlichen, egoistischen Kontrollfreak

translation.en: for a business partner!
-[ball rattles in hole] -Okay, this is it.
-You cheatin', kid? -It's putting, how could I cheat?
Hey, where is my chocolate?
You own half of the best candy store in town, don't you?
translation.de: Dir gehört die Hälfte des besten Süßwaren-Ladens.

translation.en: Sorry, yeah, I forgot. Next time.
translation.de: Tut mir leid, ja. Vergessen. Nächstes Mal.

translation.en: -What's the matter? Something wrong? -Nah, it's… It's not going as smoothly as expected.
translation.de: -Stimmt etwas nicht? -Es läuft nicht so reibungslos.

translation.en: Well, unlike you, most people resist change.
translation.de: Anders als du meiden die meisten Veränderungen.

translation.en: Yeah, but all I'm trying to do is turn a bigger profit, that helps everybody.
translation.de: Ich will nur mehr Profite, das hilft doch allen.

translation.en: And everything I suggest, everything, upsets her.
translation.de: Und alle meine Vorschläge, einfach alle, regen sie auf.

translation.en: It's a dilemma.
Oh! Did you see that? Nice shot, Dad.
It's like your mother used to say, "There's a lid for every pot."
translation.de: Deine Mutter sagte immer: "Ein Deckel für jeden Topf."

translation.en: What's that got to do with anything?
translation.de: Was hat das damit zu tun?

translation.en: She also used to say that, "At the end, it's people, not things, that matter."
translation.de: Sie sagte auch: "Am Ende zählen Menschen, nicht Dinge."

translation.en: And what do you say?
Well, I say that…
maybe you should look at the situation
from your new partner's point of view, instead of just your own.
translation.de: aus der Sicht deines neuen Partners, nicht nur aus deiner.

translation.en: Okay.
From Kerrie's perspective?
Yeah, this is a lot of change for someone who's had no change their whole life.
translation.de: Ja, das sind viele Veränderungen, wenn es nie welche gab im Leben.

translation.en: Yeah.
That can't be easy.
Here you go, Mac, have a great day. All right.
translation.de: Hier, Mac, schönen Tag noch. Ok.

translation.en: Oh, sorry.
-Don't say it. -Say what?
That you might have been right about moving the register.
translation.de: Dass du mit der Kasse doch recht hattest.

translation.en: Oh. No, I didn't say a word.
translation.de: Nein, ich sage kein Wort dazu.

translation.en: Yeah, well, you didn't have to. I can see it all over your face.
translation.de: Ja, musst du auch nicht. Dein Gesicht spricht Bände.

translation.en: I can't help it if you're a highly perceptive woman.
translation.de: Ich kann nichts dafür, dass du scharfsinnig bist.

translation.en: I got you something.
-That's for me? -Yeah, you said we needed it.
-What? -It's the prize for the raffle.
It's a jellybean jar, Bean. Yeah, great, I see that.
translation.de: -Ein Geleebohnen-Krug, Bohne. -Ja, toll, das sehe ich.

translation.en: Okay. You like it?
-It's perfect. -Okay.
Listen, I think this display case is gonna fit perfectly. I just have to put it together.
translation.de: Ok, diese Vitrine passt hier perfekt rein. Ich muss sie nur zusammenbauen.

translation.en: Jelly beans!
That's funny!
Oh, yeah, real funny.
Oh, dear.
I better go help him before he ruins the whole shop.
translation.de: Ich helfe lieber, bevor er den Laden demontiert.

translation.en: Take it easy on him. He means well.
translation.de: Schone ihn etwas. Er meint es gut.

translation.en: -Fiddlesticks. -Is everything okay?
Oh, yeah, it's fine.
You know, I didn't realize you and my brother
translation.de: Ich wusste gar nicht, dass du und mein Bruder

translation.en: kept in touch all these years.
He never mentioned anything.
I thought about it through the years, but we connected
translation.de: Ich dachte darüber nach, aber wir fanden uns

translation.en: on our high-school class's social media page.
Oh. I'm surprised you left an exciting city like New York.
translation.de: Mich wundert, dass du das aufregende New York aufgabst.

translation.en: Well, I had my reasons, you know.
Don't know if you remember this, but my dad was in the Air Force.
translation.de: Mein Dad war ja bei der Air Force.

translation.en: Right, I did know that.
Because of his job, we had to move all the time.
I… just kind of got used to that.
I've never lived anywhere longer than two years, you know?
translation.de: Ich lebte nie länger als zwei Jahre irgendwo.

translation.en: So I guess it was time for me to make a change.
translation.de: War wohl wieder Zeit für eine Veränderung.

translation.en: That must be hard on your friendships or relationships.
translation.de: Das muss für Freundschaften und Beziehungen schwierig sein.

translation.en: Yeah, I guess so.
But, you know, I get restless, just get that restless feeling.
translation.de: Aber ich werde unruhig, ich habe diese innere Unruhe.

translation.en: I wanna move, you know?
No, I actually don't know.
I'm not a big fan of change.
I've lived in the same house in the same town and had the same job…
translation.de: Selbes Haus, selbe Stadt und selber Job mein Leben lang…

translation.en: well, apart from baby-sitting… my whole life.
What about college?
Well, the university's regional campus was 30 miles away so I lived at home.
translation.de: Der Campus war 50 km entfernt, also lebte ich zu Hause.

translation.en: Unlike my daughter, who went as far away as possible.
translation.de: Meine Tochter hingegen ging so weit weg wie möglich.

translation.en: -You must have missed her, I'm sure. -Very much.
But she is following her dreams, and I'm really proud of her.
translation.de: Aber sie verfolgt ihre Träume, ich bin stolz auf sie.

translation.en: That's amazing.
Yeah.
She tells me about her adventures.
But I like it here in Bedford.
translation.de: Aber ich mag es hier in Bedford.

translation.en: I'm content.
You're content or you're happy?
Well, aren't they the same thing?
Well, no, not really.
Isn't there anything you've wanted to do that's not in this little town?
translation.de: Gibt es nichts, was du außerhalb gerne tun würdest?

translation.en: I have always wanted to go to Europe.
translation.de: Ich wollte immer mal nach Europa.

translation.en: My great grandparents, they're from a small village in Belgium.
translation.de: Meine Urgroßeltern kommen aus einem Dorf in Belgien.

translation.en: It's actually where they learned their candy-making secrets.
You should go.
Just book a ticket, make a reservation, and go. You make it sound so easy.
translation.de: -Buche ein Ticket, reserviere und los. -Bei dir klingt es so einfach.

translation.en: I mean, between school and taking care of my parents
and raising Megan and then taking over at the shop,
there just was never enough time.
But I'm sure I'll get there one day.
translation.de: Aber eines Tages werde ich hinreisen.

translation.en: I hope you do.
I guess I better get back to the kitchen.
translation.de: Ich gehe mal wieder in die Küche.

translation.en: [Alexandra] Yes, I'm her aunt.
Does she have a temperature?
No? Okay, good. I'm on my way.
Is everything okay?
That was the school nurse. Paige isn't well. I have to take her home.
translation.de: Die Schulschwester. Paige geht es nicht gut. Ich muss sie abholen.

translation.en: -Take your time, I hope she feels better. -Thanks.
Bye.
-Where's the fire? -She had to get her niece.
translation.de: -Wo brennt es? -Sie muss ihre Nichte abholen.

translation.en: Oh, okay. Um…
Listen, can we meet for lunch? My treat?
translation.de: Hör zu, essen wir zu Mittag? Ich zahle.

translation.en: I would love that, but with Winterfest five days away, I am so busy.
translation.de: Liebend gerne, aber in fünf Tagen ist schon das Winterfest.

translation.en: That's exactly what we need to discuss.
But if you're busy, I'll go get sandwiches and we can eat here.
translation.de: Ich kann auch Sandwichs holen, und wir essen hier.

translation.en: Yeah…
That's okay, I could probably use some fresh air.
translation.de: Schon gut. Etwas frische Luft tut mir gut.

translation.en: -Just give me 20 minutes to finish this. -Great.
-I'll meet you in the square? -Yes.
Great.
May I have one?
Are you gonna personally cover the cost for that?
translation.de: Wirst du die Kosten auch decken?

translation.en: You know I'm good for it.
That's amazing.
That's even better than I remembered it.
translation.de: Noch besser als in meiner Erinnerung.

translation.en: I've had gourmet chocolate that doesn't compare to that.
translation.de: Keine Gourmet-Schokolade auf der Welt kommt daran.

translation.en: That means a lot. Thank you.
-Our price point is way too low. -Oh, here we go.
translation.de: -Unser Preis ist zu niedrig. -Oh, das wieder.

translation.en: No, you're way undervaluing the product.
translation.de: Nein, du wertest das Produkt ab.

translation.en: I really appreciate the compliment,
but there are a lot of hardworking people in this town
translation.de: aber in dieser Stadt gibt es viele Arbeiter,

translation.en: trying to make ends meet
and they shouldn't have to budget to treat themselves to some candy.
translation.de: Da sollten sie nicht noch für Süßes nachrechnen müssen.

translation.en: Okay, point taken.
-I'll see you in the square. -Yeah.
So good!
-Brooks! -Hi.
Erin Smythe? We went to high school together.
translation.de: Erin Smythe? Wir gingen zusammen zur High School.

translation.en: [Brooks] That's right. Hi, how are you? Nice to see you.
translation.de: Stimmt. Hi, wie geht's? Wie schön.

translation.en: So, what have you been doing? Where are you living now?
translation.de: Was hast du so getrieben? Wo lebst du?

translation.en: Tell me everything.
My parents still have a place here, and I have a satellite office in Cincinnati.
translation.de: Meine Eltern leben noch hier, und ich habe ein Büro in Cincinnati.

translation.en: I am an executive headhunter.
-That's impressive. -What's impressive is your career.
-I've been watching it over the years. -I've been very fortunate.
translation.de: -Ich verfolge sie seit Jahren. -Ich hatte Glück.

translation.en: What surprised me was the candy shop.
That's such a huge departure from your usual ventures.
It is, but it's nice to be back here in Bedford.
translation.de: Ja, aber Bedford ist ein Plus.

translation.en: I don't mean to interrupt. We can talk later.
translation.de: Ich will nicht stören. Reden wir später.

translation.en: No, Kerrie, you remember Erin Smythe? Still the last name you go by?
translation.de: Nein, Kerrie, kennst du Erin Smythe noch? Heißt du noch so?

translation.en: Yes, I never married.
Oh, yeah, I sure do.
-Erin, how are you? -Good, thanks for asking.
This is Kerrie, Jake's little sister, my new business partner.
translation.de: Kerrie, Jakes kleine Schwester und meine Geschäftspartnerin.

translation.en: Oh, Jake, I adored him. He was the best.
translation.de: Jake, ich liebte ihn. Er war der Beste.

translation.en: He still is. I'll tell him you said hello.
translation.de: Ist er noch. Ich richte ihm Grüße aus.

translation.en: -Please do. -You gotta come by the shop sometime.
She makes the most unbelievable chocolate and candies…
translation.de: Sie macht die beste Schokolade und besten Süßwaren…

translation.en: Sounds delicious, but I don't eat sugar.
translation.de: Klingt köstlich, aber ich esse keinen Zucker.

translation.en: [sighs] I don't want to keep you two from your business, so…
translation.de: Ich will euch zwei nicht aufhalten, also…

translation.en: -We should catch up more later. -I'd love that. Okay, great.
Uh… Italian or turkey? Ooh! Italian.
-Hey. -Oh, thank you.
I have been going through the financials for the past five years.
translation.de: Ich ging die Finanzen der letzten fünf Jahre durch.

translation.en: I think, with a few changes… we can double last year's numbers.
translation.de: Mit minimalen Änderungen… können wir die Zahlen verdoppeln.

translation.en: This is the amount of free product that was given away last year.
translation.de: Das ist die Anzahl an Gratis-Produkten im letzten Jahr.

translation.en: I thought that was a charitable tax write-off.
translation.de: Das kann man doch als Wohltätigkeit abschreiben?

translation.en: Charity is a wonderful thing.
But I think that number's way too high.
translation.de: Aber die Zahl ist wirklich zu hoch.

translation.en: There are a lot of deserving people, Brooks.
There's first responders, teachers,
the elderly at the Senior Village.
You are a bleeding heart, Kerrie Murphy.
translation.de: Dein Herz ist so groß, Kerrie.

translation.en: Yes. It bleeds candy.
Not everything is about the bottom line.
translation.de: Es geht nicht nur um Geld.

translation.en: When you're running a business and trying to be in the black, it is.
translation.de: Will man schwarze Zahlen haben, dann leider schon.

translation.en: If that's all you care about, why did you buy into a small, family-owned business?
translation.de: Wenn es dir nur darum geht, wieso dann ein kleiner Familienbetrieb?

translation.en: We are a far cry from a Fortune 500 company.
No, I see great potential.
Why did you buy Jake out?
'Cause Willy Wonka's my favorite movie. I always wanted to own a candy factory.
translation.de: Willy Wonka ist mein Lieblingsfilm, ich wollte immer einen Bonbon-Laden.

translation.en: I'm sorry we don't have a chocolate river for you to fall in.
translation.de: Tut mir leid, wir haben keinen Schokofluss.

translation.en: Or Oompa Loompas.
That would be great, wouldn't it?
That's important, a strong work/life balance.
To the bottom line?
Well, if you're exhausted and burnt out, you're of no use to me.
translation.de: Wenn du ausgebrannt bist, bist du nutzlos für mich.

translation.en: No, but seriously.
You work all the time. You need some downtime.
translation.de: Du arbeitest nur. Du brauchst eine Auszeit.

translation.en: Why don't you take a vacation? Or a staycation.
translation.de: Fahr mal weg. Oder entspanne hier.

translation.en: It has been a while since I've had any time off. I didn't even take a honeymoon.
translation.de: Ist lange her, dass ich Pause machte. Ich hatte nicht mal Flitterwochen.

translation.en: Free time, I don't know what I'd do with myself.
translation.de: Freizeit, was soll ich damit anfangen?

translation.en: Take a trip to Europe?
Alone? No.
How long's it been since you were divorced?
I mean… Sorry, that's a personal question.
translation.de: Tut mir leid, das war persönlich.

translation.en: That's okay.
I got married relatively young.
Marriage lasted about four years.
I naively thought that love could conquer all our differences.
translation.de: Naiverweise nahm ich an, dass Liebe alle Differenzen überwindet.

translation.en: But he's a good dad to Megan, and that's all that matters.
translation.de: Aber er ist ein guter Dad für Megan, und nur das zählt.

translation.en: What about you?
Oh, never married, no kids.
But I am known to my friends' children as "Fun Uncle Brooks."
translation.de: Aber die Kinder meiner Freunde nennen mich "Spaßonkel Brooks".

translation.en: I was voted "Life of the Party" in high school, remember that?
translation.de: In der High School wurde ich doch zum "Partyhengst" gekürt.

translation.en: Oh, right!
So that's the real reason you wanted to buy into the candy store.
translation.de: Deshalb wolltest du dich in den Laden einkaufen.

translation.en: You wanted to keep your title.
Of course. You're seeing through me now.
[Kerrie] How is Paige feeling?
It was just a tummy ache. She's back to a hundred percent.
translation.de: Es war nur Bauchweh. Sie ist wieder fit.

translation.en: Oh, good. I'm glad.
Have you heard from Megan? How's she doing?
translation.de: Von Megan gehört? Wie geht es ihr?

translation.en: Oh, she is having the time of her life,
translation.de: Sie hat den Spaß ihres Lebens,

translation.en: visiting a different country every weekend.
You want some more hot cocoa?
Oh, I'm good, thanks.
Oh! I found this this morning.
translation.de: Oh! Ich fand heute Morgen etwas.

translation.en: I have been dying to show you. Wait.
translation.de: Das muss ich dir zeigen. Warte.

translation.en: -Look, look, look. -Oh, looks like a yearbook!
-Let's see! -Yes, it is. Look.
This is me.
Right here. My sophomore year.
You are adorable.
Goodness, where does the time go?
translation.de: Meine Güte, wo ist die Zeit geblieben?

translation.en: Let me see if I can find my brother.
-Ooh! There he is. -[Alexandra] Oh, look at Jake!
translation.de: -Da ist er. -Oh, sieh dir Jake an!

translation.en: What was his senior quote?
Oh, "Life is like a box of candies. You get what you get and you don't get upset."
translation.de: "Das Leben ist eine Schachtel Schokolade. Man kriegt, was man kriegt, das war's."

translation.en: That is fitting.
Oh, and here's Brooks.
Mm! He was handsome.
And looks super confident even back then.
translation.de: Und schon damals wirkte er selbstbewusst.

translation.en: Confident, arrogant, whatever you want to call it.
"Life belongs to the living,
and he who lives must be prepared for changes."
translation.de: und der Lebende muss Veränderungen annehmen."

translation.en: [Alexandra] That's a pretty deep quote for a teenager.
And the polar opposite to your outlook on change.
translation.de: Und das Gegenteil deiner Sicht auf Veränderungen.

translation.en: Yeah. I guess that's true.
-Thank you. -Here's an order form.
Order form for you?
Order form for you and ord--
Adam! Order form?
Thanks.
-Do you have a pen? -Oh, yep. Ah!
What do you recommend?
Oh, I mean, everything here is delicious. That's the problem.
translation.de: -Hier ist alles köstlich. -Das ist das Problem.

translation.en: Here's a better question: what's your favorite?
Oh, um… peppermint bark.
Peppermint bark it is.
You guys are busier than ever. We are. It's gonna be crazy until after Winterfest.
translation.de: -Hier ist mehr los als je. -Ja. Bis zum Winterfest wird es heftig.

translation.en: I actually wanted to ask if I could… I guess I'll catch you later.
translation.de: Ich wollte dich fragen, ob ich… Wir reden besser nachher.

translation.en: Yes, please.
I'll be back with more forms.
Bye.
[Brooks] Thank you.
Hi. I'll have three mint meltaways,
three of your new salted coconut caramel buttercreams, please.
Three…
Here you go.
Okay.
[whispering] Kerrie always gives me a sample.
translation.de: Kerrie gibt mir immer etwas extra.

translation.en: -Don't tell anyone. -It'll be our little secret.
You need someone sweet in your life. No, I have my dad.
translation.de: -Sie brauchen eine Süße im Leben. -Nein, ich habe Dad.

translation.en: Though I wouldn't call him sweet, the word I'd use is "cantankerous."
translation.de: Süß ist er wohl kaum, "mürrisch" trifft es besser.

translation.en: Well, keep your eye open. You never know.
translation.de: Halten Sie die Augen offen. Man weiß nie.

translation.en: Thank you.
You weren't kidding. It's the busiest time of year. It's a madhouse up there.
translation.de: Es ist die heißeste Zeit des Jahres. Das reinste Irrenhaus.

translation.en: We're out of vanilla buttercreams.
-No, I made a batch earlier this morning. -I'll go get them.
translation.de: -Nein, ich machte welche heute früh. -Ich hole sie.

translation.en: -You are unbelievable. -You're just figuring that out?
translation.de: -Du bist unglaublich. -Merkst du das jetzt erst?

translation.en: Well, teenage boys are not known for their wisdom.
-Yeah? What's your excuse now? -It's unbelievable how good these are.
translation.de: -Ja? Welche Ausrede hast du jetzt? -Die sind so lecker.

translation.en: Someday you'll have to teach me your magical candy-making secrets.
translation.de: Irgendwann musst du mir deine geheimen Künste beibringen.

translation.en: I'm making chocolate snowflakes tonight.
You're welcome to stick around and help if you want.
translation.de: Du kannst mir gerne dabei helfen.

translation.en: -Really? -Sure.
-I wouldn't be in the way? -If you are, I'll kick you out.
translation.de: -Störe ich nicht? -Dann schmeiße ich dich raus.

translation.en: I believe you would. [laughs]
-I'd love that, I'll bring coffee. -A hot cider, and you're on.
Aye-aye, Bean.
Thank you.
Don't give me that look.
Hi, Erin, how are you?
[Erin] You will never guess who I just got off the phone with.
translation.de: Du rätst nie, mit wem ich telefonierte.

translation.en: A global top ten company. And they are looking for a new COO.
translation.de: Eine globale Top-10-Firma. Sie suchen einen neuen Geschäftsführer.

translation.en: I immediately thought of you.
Global top ten?! That's incredible.
These positions rarely open up.
translation.de: Die Stellen gibt es nur selten.

translation.en: They are highly coveted and very prestigious.
translation.de: Sie sind heiß begehrt und sehr prestigevoll.

translation.en: Not to mention the bonuses and benefits.
translation.de: Und erst die Boni und Zulagen.

translation.en: Now, their main office is in California,
but they would be open to you working from the Cincinnati office.
translation.de: aber du könntest auch im Büro in Cincinnati arbeiten.

translation.en: I told them all about you, they're very impressed.
translation.de: Ich erzählte von dir, sie waren beeindruckt.

translation.en: Wow! Wow!
They want to meet you.
Listen, I know this is a once-in-a-lifetime offer, and I'm very flattered, but--
translation.de: Das ist ein einmaliges Angebot, und ich fühle mich geschmeichelt, aber…

translation.en: You don't need to decide this minute.
Take some time. All right?
All right.
Listen, I've got another call.
I will fill you in on the rest of the details later.
translation.de: Ich erzähle dir später alle Details.

translation.en: -How does over a late dinner sound? -Sure, but--
Great, can't wait.
Okay. Ready for my first lesson.
translation.de: Ok. Bereit für meine erste Lektion.

translation.en: All right.
This is a cacao bean from South America.
translation.de: Das ist eine Kakaobohne aus Südamerika.

translation.en: Our family has done business with the same cocoa farm for generations.
translation.de: Unsere Familie bezieht sie seit Generationen von derselben Farm.

translation.en: It's not like a coffee bean, but with a little alchemy, it'll turn into…
translation.de: Es ist keine Kaffeebohne, aber mit etwas Alchemie wird daraus…

translation.en: Liquid gold.
Yes.
There's a reason they say chocolate is the food of the gods.
translation.de: Man nennt Schokolade nicht grundlos "Speise der Götter".

translation.en: Um, pick a mold.
Okay, any mold?
Any mold.
Oh. I'll do that. Winter tulips.
Oh! You're a romantic. Who knew?
translation.de: Oh! Ein Romantiker. Wer hätte das gedacht?

translation.en: I think people are beginning to suspect.
Okay, this is your chocolate. It's the right temperature.
translation.de: Ok, hier ist deine Schokolade. Mit richtiger Temperatur.

translation.en: It's pretty simple, you're gonna pour it into this mold.
translation.de: Es ist ganz einfach, gieße sie einfach in die Form.

translation.en: You're an artist and chocolate is your medium.
translation.de: Du bist Künstlerin, und Schokolade ist dein Medium.

translation.en: [Kerrie] I think it is a good combination of art and science.
translation.de: Es ist eine gute Kombination aus Kunst und Wissenschaft.

translation.en: I never get to do anything creative in my line of work.
translation.de: Bei meiner Arbeit kann ich nie kreativ sein.

translation.en: It's all spreadsheets and numbers.
This is fun.
If you think this is fun, wait till we make butterscotch candy pillows.
translation.de: Warte ab, bis wir Buttertoffee-Bonbonkissen machen.

translation.en: Have you ever thought about teaching a class?
Actually, I would like to teach a class.
In fact, Jake and I talked about that and then we never organized anything.
translation.de: Jake und ich sprachen darüber, aber wir organisierten nie etwas.

translation.en: Really? I'll be happy to set that up for you if you want.
translation.de: Echt? Ich arrangiere das gerne für dich.

translation.en: -Really? -No problem.
Thanks.
That's okay. That's okay.
We're just gonna do this.
All you have to do is tip that, then we'll fill all the molds.
translation.de: Du musst es nur anheben und alle Formen damit füllen.

translation.en: Hello.
-Oh, Erin. Hi, how are you? -Hi.
-Come in. -Thanks.
You didn't text me back about what time you wanted to have that late dinner.
translation.de: Du sagtest nie, wann das späte Abendessen sein soll.

translation.en: Oh, uh… Sorry, my phone was off and we were in the middle of--
translation.de: Oh… Tut mir leid, mein Handy war aus, wir machten gerade…

translation.en: Kerrie is teaching me how to make and pour chocolate molds.
translation.de: Kerrie zeigt mir, wie man Schokolade in Formen gießt.

translation.en: I find that's a useful skill for a candy shop owner.
Of course. [laughs]
Oh! Who knew you, of all people, would have turned out to be Willy Wonka?
translation.de: Wer hätte gedacht, dass ausgerechnet du zu Willy Wonka wirst.

translation.en: [laughs] That's actually just what we were saying. Well, you should get going.
translation.de: -Darüber sprachen wir eben. -Nun, ihr solltet los.

translation.en: No, but the lesson.
No, it's fine. We can do it another time.
Go, have fun.
Come on, she doesn't mind.
translation.de: Komm, es ist ok für sie.

translation.en: All right, let me go get my coat.
[sighs] Do you want some candy?
-No, you don't eat sugar. -Right.
What was I thinking? I practically kicked him out the door.
translation.de: Was habe ich nur gedacht? Ich schmiss ihn förmlich raus.

translation.en: [chuckles] Sounds like someone is catching feelings.
translation.de: Da fängt sich wohl einer Gefühle ein.

translation.en: What is that, like catching a cold?
Girl, it means you like him.
[laughing] No. No, no, no.
I admit, the business partnership is working out better than I expected,
translation.de: Ich gebe zu, dass die Geschäftsbeziehung besser als erwartet funktioniert,

translation.en: but I do not need any romantic entanglements to complicate my life.
translation.de: aber Romantik macht mein Leben nur komplizierter.

translation.en: I like my life the way it is.
Change isn't always a bad thing.
Like you said, the new partnership is working out.
translation.de: Du sagst, dass die Partnerschaft gut läuft.

translation.en: Maybe a new relationship will too?
translation.de: Vielleicht ja auch eine neue Beziehung?

translation.en: Even if…
No.
Anyway, he's dating Erin.
That's the cheerleader he took to the dance over me.
translation.de: Die Cheerleaderin, die er damals zum Ball mitnahm.

translation.en: You're kidding?
But it's okay, if he's happy, I'm happy for him.
translation.de: Alles ok. Wenn er glücklich ist, freue ich mich.

translation.en: I see the way you two look at each other, I wouldn't write him off just yet.
translation.de: Ich sehe eure Blicke. Schreib ihn noch nicht ab.

translation.en: Alexandra! You forgot your scarf.
I wouldn't want your neck to get cold.
translation.de: Dein Hals soll nicht kalt werden.

translation.en: That was thoughtful of you. Thank you.
Any time.
Looks like someone else is catching feelings.
translation.de: Anscheinend fängt sich noch wer Gefühle ein.

translation.en: He's just being friendly.
He's a very conscientious restaurateur.
I don't know about that.
If I left my scarf, I'm pretty sure it would end up in the lost-and-found bin.
translation.de: Mein Schal wäre bestimmt in der Fundecke gelandet.

translation.en: Oh, come on, Winterfest is just two days away.
translation.de: Oh, komm schon. In zwei Tagen ist das Winterfest.

translation.en: We got a lot to do.
Morning.
Morning.
I'm going to finish the last batch of peanut brittle.
How was your date?
I wouldn't call it a date.
Just a couple of friends having pizza and catching up.
translation.de: Nur eine Pizza unter Freunden, die reden.

translation.en: Erin's an executive headhunter,
but I like to think that I've left that world behind.
translation.de: aber diese Welt ließ ich wohl hinter mir.

translation.en: Oh, well, good for her.
And good for you.
Yeah.
She's a good person and a good friend, but not what I'm looking for.
translation.de: Sie ist eine nette Person und Freundin, aber nicht das, wonach ich suche.

translation.en: What are you looking for?
It's funny, I was thinking about this the other day. I think…
translation.de: Lustig, neulich dachte ich darüber nach. Ich denke…

translation.en: I think I'd like a best friend.
Someone who challenges me, but also who has my back.
translation.de: Der mich herausfordert, aber gleichzeitig unterstützt.

translation.en: Who's genuine but genuinely cares about me, you know?
translation.de: Der authentisch ist, aber dem ich auch wichtig bin, ok?

translation.en: I agree.
That is the least of what you deserve.
Okay. [chuckles]
What, uh…
What do you mean?
I'm just saying, um, that…
that you deserve someone who sees that,
underneath that often bossy, take charge,
translation.de: dass unter diesem oft herrischen, kommandierenden,

translation.en: sometimes socially tone-deaf successful suit exterior…
is a really decent guy.
Thank you.
That's nice, thank you.
You're welcome.
-[door opens] -Oh, hi, welcome to Murphy's.
-[woman] Hi. -What can I get for you?
[sighs] I'm off to the Senior Pavilion. Need any help?
Oh, no, I shouldn't be that long. Um…
Also, Brooks will be by after lunch. Sounds good. I've got everything covered.
translation.de: -Brooks kommt nach dem Essen. -Klingt gut. Ich habe alles im Griff.

translation.en: -I can see that, that is amazing. -Thanks.
-You're so talented. -See you later.
This will look nice on your door, until next spring at least.
translation.de: Das sieht super aus an deiner Tür, bis zum Frühjahr.

translation.en: This is for my new friend, Eileen.
translation.de: Es ist für meine neue Freundin Eileen.

translation.en: [chuckles] Okay.
-Isn't tomorrow the big Winterfest? -Yeah. Yeah, it is.
Oh, that reminds me. I brought you your favorite candy.
translation.de: Oh, apropos… Ich habe dein Lieblingskonfekt.

translation.en: Rocky road fudge?
What? Since when is that your favorite?
translation.de: Was? Seit wann ist das dein Favorit?

translation.en: I got you toffee.
Well… I'm just testing.
translation.de: Nun… das war nur ein Test.

translation.en: Toffee is my favorite, come on!
Yeah!
How is that all coming along with your new business partner?
translation.de: Wie läuft es eigentlich mit deiner neuen Partnerin?

translation.en: Great. She's feisty.
She's a mama bear with a cub when it comes to her shop.
translation.de: Bei ihrem Laden ist sie wie eine Bärin mit Jungem.

translation.en: She really speaks her mind. But she's also passionate about her craft.
translation.de: Sie spricht alles ehrlich aus. Und sie liebt ihre Arbeit.

translation.en: But then when she lets her guard down, she's sweet.
translation.de: Aber wenn sie sich etwas öffnet, ist sie süß.

translation.en: Pardon the pun. [chuckles] But she's fun, she's funny.
translation.de: Verzeih das Wortspiel. Sie ist echt witzig.

translation.en: Sounds like a perfect match for you.
No, not like that, Dad.
Just because you've been burned once doesn't mean you give up altogether.
translation.de: Nur weil du mal verletzt wurdest, musst du es nicht ganz aufgeben.

translation.en: Dad, we're business partners, that's it.
Look, it seems to me, son, that if you share the same values
translation.de: Sohn, wenn man die gleichen Werte teilt,

translation.en: and goals and outlooks,
and you know how to compromise,
translation.de: und man für Kompromisse bereit ist,

translation.en: you've got most of the ingredients to have a successful relationship.
translation.de: hat man die besten Zutaten für eine erfolgreiche Beziehung.

translation.en: I had a big offer, the kind you don't refuse, come across my desk.
translation.de: Ich erhielt ein Angebot, die Art, die man nicht ablehnt.

translation.en: -And? -Well, I'm thinking it over.
I told them I needed some time.
Although I'd be lying if I said I wasn't tempted.
translation.de: Aber ich gebe zu, ich bin versucht.

translation.en: But also, I don't really miss that shark- and piranha-filled world.
translation.de: Obwohl ich diese Haifischbecken-Welt nicht vermisse.

translation.en: And I made a commitment to Jake and Kerrie, so…
translation.de: Und ich verpflichtete mich Jake und Kerrie…

translation.en: The important question is, are you happy here?
translation.de: Die Frage lautet doch: Bist du hier glücklich?

translation.en: Yeah, I am.
That's all that matters.
Kerrie! Hi. What are you doing here?
translation.de: Kerrie! Hi. Was tust du hier?

translation.en: What are you doing here?
This is my dad, Joel.
Everybody calls me Papa Joel.
It is very nice to meet you, Papa Joel.
I see where Brooks gets his sparkling eyes.
translation.de: Von Ihnen hat Brooks also die leuchtenden Augen.

translation.en: And his sweet tooth. [chuckles]
It's nicer meeting you. I've heard a lot about you.
translation.de: Ich freue mich ebenfalls. Ich hörte vieles über Sie.

translation.en: Oh, no. If you heard it from him, it's probably not true.
translation.de: Oh nein. Wenn es von ihm kam, stimmt es sicher nicht.

translation.en: [laughs] Oh, I like her.
He doesn't say that about many people. Well, I'm honored.
translation.de: -Das sagt er nicht über viele. -Ich fühle mich geehrt.

translation.en: Uh, what are you doing here, making deliveries for Winterfest?
translation.de: Lieferst du Sachen fürs Winterfest aus?

translation.en: You know, you would probably consider this
translation.de: Nun, für dich sind das wohl eher

translation.en: a bimonthly, tax deductible charitable donation,
but I like to call it,
"never showing up empty-handed when you're visiting friends."
translation.de: "Komm nie mit leeren Händen zu Freunden."

translation.en: Martha! That is a beautiful wreath.
translation.de: Martha! Was für ein schöner Kranz.

translation.en: I have your favorite candy. You're gonna love this.
translation.de: Ich habe Ihr Lieblingskonfekt. Sie werden es lieben.

translation.en: Well…
Oh! Making these winter wreaths just wears me out.
I'm gonna take a nap. Oh, yeah, Dad, it's real strenuous.
translation.de: -Ich mache ein Nickerchen. -Ja, Dad. Echt anstrengend.

translation.en: And, uh, I think
that you should just go over there
and help that pretty business partner of yours.
-That's real subtle, Dad. -I'll see you later.
All right, enjoy, you guys.
You need any help? Sure. Would you mind giving this to Jack? He's over there.
translation.de: -Brauchst du Hilfe? -Klar. Gib das bitte Jack da drüben.

translation.en: He has allergies so I make these special for him.
translation.de: Er hat Allergien, ich mache sie nur für ihn.

translation.en: What?
Nothing. You just… you continue to surprise me.
translation.de: Nichts. Du… Du überraschst mich immer wieder.

translation.en: Well, I could say the same about you.
translation.de: Das könnte ich auch über dich sagen.

translation.en: Thank you for helping me.
Oh, and for not lecturing me about all the product I'm giving away.
translation.de: Und dass ich keine Lektion erhalte wegen der Gratis-Sachen.

translation.en: I would never do that.
Look how happy you're making everybody.
Okay, who are you and what have you done with my business partner?
translation.de: Ok, wer bist du und wo ist mein Geschäftspartner?

translation.en: That's true.
I have spent my whole life being obsessed with the bottom line,
translation.de: Mein Leben lang ging es mir nur ums Geld,

translation.en: but I think now I'm realizing that, I don't know… there's more to life.
translation.de: aber nun erkenne ich, dass… Keine Ahnung. Es gibt mehr im Leben.

translation.en: Well, I suppose without a profit,
there wouldn't be any product to give away, so…
So you're saying that we make a good team? Yeah?
translation.de: Sind wir also ein gutes Team? Ja?

translation.en: Hey, when you're done with this, there's something I want to show you.
translation.de: Wenn du hier fertig bist, möchte ich dir etwas zeigen.

translation.en: -Okay. Yeah. -Okay?
I found this place when I was out with my dad.
translation.de: Ich fand die Stelle mit Dad.

translation.en: Oh, it's really nice.
How come your dad lives here and not with you?
translation.de: Wieso lebt dein Dad hier und nicht bei dir?

translation.en: Or is that too personal? No, not at all.
He says he doesn't like my cooking.
[laughs] He's just very independent.
And he also has a very active social life.
translation.de: Und er hat ein aktives Sozialleben.

translation.en: I think it comes from years of living on a military base surrounded by people.
translation.de: Auf Militärbasen war er ja auch immer von Leuten umgeben.

translation.en: Oh, that makes sense.
I bet Papa Joel is popular with the ladies too.
translation.de: Papa Joel kommt sicher auch bei den Damen an.

translation.en: He has friends, but he says that my mom was the love of his life,
translation.de: Er hat Freundinnen, aber für ihn war meine Mom die Liebe seines Lebens,

translation.en: his soulmate, and the only one that's truly in his heart.
translation.de: seine Seelenverwandte, nur sie ist in seinem Herzen.

translation.en: -That's beautiful. -Yeah.
I've always wanted to have that kind of devotion to someone, but…
translation.de: Ich wollte immer diese Hingabe zu jemandem, aber…

translation.en: But you never live in one place long enough?
translation.de: Aber du warst nie lange genug an einem Ort?

translation.en: Okay. I accept that.
translation.de: Ok. Das nehme ich so an.

translation.en: But I've answered all your questions. Come here.
translation.de: Ich beantwortete all deine Fragen. Komm.

translation.en: I've got some… [clears throat]
Why did you shun me so much in high school?
translation.de: Wieso hast du mich in der Schule so gemieden?

translation.en: I didn't shun you.
Okay.
This is gonna sound really childish now, but…
translation.de: Das klingt jetzt total kindisch, aber…

translation.en: you picked on me all the time.
Relentlessly.
Well, yeah, of course.
You were my best friend's very cute, off-limits little sister.
translation.de: Du warst die süße, unantastbare, kleine Schwester meines besten Freunds.

translation.en: Of course I picked on you. That was my job.
translation.de: Klar ärgerte ich dich. Das war mein Job.

translation.en: You were also very arrogant!
Okay.
Yeah.
I accept that. I was the new kid in a new school every other year
translation.de: Das war wohl so. Ich war jedes Jahr der Neue an der Schule,

translation.en: since I was five years old, so I learned to go in strong.
translation.de: seit ich fünf war, also machte ich auf stark.

translation.en: Otherwise, I'd be eaten alive.
Kids are vicious. Especially in high school.
translation.de: Kinder sind bösartig. Vor allem in der High School.

translation.en: So it was a façade, was it?
Yeah, more than you know.
Listen, I want to apologize.
I didn't mean to pick on you. I never meant that meanly.
translation.de: Ich wollte dich nicht ärgern. Es war nicht böse gemeint.

translation.en: I'm very sorry.
And I wanna ask you if there's anything else that I did during that time,
translation.de: Und wenn es damals noch etwas gab, was ich tat,

translation.en: because I would like to apologize for that too.
Fine.
When I was a sophomore and you were a senior…
translation.de: Als ich im zweiten Jahr war und du im letzten,

translation.en: I was under the impression that you invited me to be your date to the Winter Snowball Dance.
translation.de: nahm ich an, du hättest mich als dein Date für den Winter-Schneeball-Ball eingeladen.

translation.en: I bought a dress, I did my hair and make-up, and…
translation.de: Ich kaufte ein Kleid, Frisur und Make-up, und…

translation.en: I waited all night and you never showed up.
translation.de: Ich wartete den ganzen Abend, aber du kamst nicht.

translation.en: I nev-- I'm so sorry, Kerrie, I never knew that I gave you that impression.
translation.de: Ich… Das tut mir leid, Kerrie. Das wusste ich nicht.

translation.en: -If I had known, I never would have-- -I know.
-I'm sorry, Bean. -Oh, that's another thing.
I detested that nickname.
Because of you, in high school, I was called
every variation a person could think of.
Uh, Stinky Bean, Bossy Bean, Jelly Bean.
The list went on and on.
Sorry.
Listen, I would like you to consider forgiving me,
translation.de: Ich würde mich freuen, wenn du mir vergibst,

translation.en: and I would like to ask you if this could be a fresh start for us.
translation.de: und wir von vorne anfangen könnten.

translation.en: What do you say?
Okay.
Fresh start.
You never did tell me why you moved back.
translation.de: Du sagtest nie, wieso du zurückkamst.

translation.en: Here? Oh, I just… Yeah, I had fond memories of Bedford.
translation.de: Hierhin? Oh, ich… Ich hatte schöne Erinnerungen an Bedford.

translation.en: I wanted to get out of the city, and Jake called at the right time, so…
translation.de: Ich wollte raus aus der Stadt, und Jakes Anruf war perfekt, also…

translation.en: And, uh, also…
What?
It's nothing.
That's okay.
We should get going. Lots to do before the big day tomorrow.
translation.de: Wir sollten los. Morgen ist der große Tag.

translation.en: Okay. All right, let's get to it.
Okay.
-A fresh start. -Yes. Fresh start.
I remember when you and Jake planned the senior prank
translation.de: Und als du und Jake den Abistreich plantet

translation.en: and you bubble-wrapped the hallways. [chuckles] I plead the fifth.
translation.de: -und alle Gänge mit Folie auslegtet. -Ich verweigerte die Aussage.

translation.en: Although I will say, whoever thought of that… absolute genius.
translation.de: Aber ich muss sagen… Wer sich das ausdachte: Absoluter Genie.

translation.en: It was funny.
I also remember a sweet sophomore gifting the entire graduating senior class
translation.de: Und ein süßes Mädchen im zweiten Jahr schenkte allen Abiturienten

translation.en: their own personalized box of candy.
Yes, you almost didn't get one. My parents made me include you.
translation.de: Ja, Glück gehabt. Meine Eltern zwangen mich, dich einzubeziehen.

translation.en: It's kind of embarrassing. I've never had a…
translation.de: Es ist etwas peinlich. Aber ich hatte nie…

translation.en: I don't know how a cocoa bomb works.
Oh, well, I'll show you.
You take this, you put it right in there.
And then you add some hot milk.
translation.de: Dann gießt man heiße Milch dazu.

translation.en: Watch this.
See, that explodes, and there are all the marshmallows.
translation.de: Sie explodiert, alle Marshmallows kommen raus.

translation.en: Oh, that's cool!
-Try it. -Oh. Thank you.
That's amazing.
You made all those? That's incredible. Oh, it's not that hard. I can teach you.
translation.de: -Du hast die gemacht? Unglaublich. -Einfach. Ich bringe es dir bei.

translation.en: [clears throat] Well, that is the last one.
Think we're all set for tomorrow.
Okay, well, I have some financials to do, so…
translation.de: Ok, ich muss noch Finanzen durchgehen, also…

translation.en: I'll lock up, you guys can take off.
translation.de: Ich schließe ab, geht ihr ruhig.

translation.en: Okay. Don't work too late.
We have a big day tomorrow.
Yes, ma'am.
I'll go get my coat and my things.
I haven't seen you smile like this since I don't know when.
translation.de: Ich habe dich noch nie so lächeln sehen.

translation.en: After my divorce, I just focused on raising Megan and running the shop.
translation.de: Nach meiner Scheidung gab es nur Megan und den Laden.

translation.en: I didn't want another failed relationship.
translation.de: Ich wollte nicht noch eine gescheiterte Beziehung.

translation.en: Maybe you didn't fail. Maybe the marriage failed you.
translation.de: Vielleicht bist nicht du gescheitert. Sondern die Ehe.

translation.en: Maybe.
I'm happy for you. Everyone deserves a second chance.
translation.de: Ich freue mich für dich. Jeder verdient eine zweite Chance.

translation.en: Especially when it comes to love.
