Jake. What time is it there?
translation.de: Jake. Wie spät ist es dort?

translation.en: And what are you eating?
I was hungry for a midnight snack.
It's almost one a.m. I couldn't sleep.
translation.de: Fast eins. Ich kann nicht schlafen.

translation.en: Beans on toast.
Funny with the beans.
So… you all set for Winterfest tomorrow?
Yes. The candy is all made
and Brooks is going to meet me early and help me set up the booth.
translation.de: und Brooks und ich bauen am Morgen den Stand auf.

translation.en: Yeah, he mentioned that to me when I spoke to him earlier.
translation.de: Ja, er erwähnte es, als wir vorhin sprachen.

translation.en: You talked to him?
Don't worry, he's going to turn down Erin's business proposal.
translation.de: Keine Sorge, er lehnt Erins Angebot ab.

translation.en: Wait, what business proposal?
I thought he told you. Apparently not.
translation.de: -Ich dachte, er sagte es dir. -Anscheinend nicht.

translation.en: You care to fill me in?
I'm waiting.
Here you go. Happy Winterfest.
I'm feeling a little thirsty. Would you like a hot cider?
-I'd love one. -Okay.
I'll be right back.
There you go. What's going on with Kerrie?
What do you mean?
Is she okay?
Oh, she's probably just stressed. This is the biggest day of the year for the shop.
translation.de: Oh, sie ist sicher nur gestresst. Das ist der wichtigste Tag für den Laden.

translation.en: Right. Where did she go?
To get us a couple of hot ciders.
Oh. Do you want one?
No, thanks. One is plenty for me.
Oh, right, okay.
Two ciders, please.
-Busy day, huh? -Oh, yeah, very busy.
You're not upset with me?
translation.de: Du bist nicht sauer auf mich?

translation.en: No, I just have to get back to the booth. Can we talk later? Great.
translation.de: Nein, ich muss zum Stand. Wir reden später? Super.

translation.en: Hey, you.
I had a fun time the other night.
It was fun, yeah, connecting with old friends. Not that you're old. That's not what I meant.
translation.de: Ja, es war nett, alte Freunde zu treffen. Du bist nicht alt. So meine ich es nicht.

translation.en: I do. I know what you mean.
translation.de: Schon klar. Ich weiß, was du meinst.

translation.en: Not to sound cliché, but it's true, you know what they say.
translation.de: Es ist ein Klischee, aber wahr. Es heißt ja immer:

translation.en: Old friends are the best. Absolutely. Yeah.
So, not to pressure you, but I need to know.
translation.de: Ich will dich nicht drängen, aber ich muss es wissen.

translation.en: There you go.
What's going on with you two?
Nothing. What do you mean?
Yesterday it was all fireworks, today it's like the ice age.
translation.de: Gestern sprühten Funken, heute herrscht Eiszeit.

translation.en: Oh, hi, Eileen, how are you? I have your order.
translation.de: Hi, Eileen, wie geht's? Ich habe Ihre Bestellung.

translation.en: I am fantastic and enjoying this wonderful festival.
translation.de: Mir geht es fantastisch, ich genieße das wundervolle Festival.

translation.en: -How are you? -Oh, great.
Winterfest is the best time of year.
Are you all right, dear?
Yes. It's just been a tumultuous month, and once again, things aren't certain.
translation.de: Es war ein turbulenter Monat, und wieder ist nichts sicher.

translation.en: [Eileen] Nothing in life ever is.
translation.de: Das ist es nie im Leben.

translation.en: But I do believe that what's meant to be will always find a way.
translation.de: Aber was sein soll, findet immer seinen Weg.

translation.en: The client is really interested in meeting you,
translation.de: Der Kunde will dich unbedingt treffen,

translation.en: and between you and me, you are a shoo-in for the COO position.
translation.de: und ganz unter uns: Du bist perfekt für die Position.

translation.en: It would be a huge step up in the corporate world.
translation.de: Es wäre ein Riesenschritt nach oben.

translation.en: But I need to know either way.
I can't tell you how much I appreciate this offer,
translation.de: Ich schätze dein Angebot wirklich sehr,

translation.en: but, even though I might regret this in the future,
translation.de: und auch wenn ich es irgendwann mal bereuen könnte,

translation.en: I'm going to turn down the opportunity.
I'm very committed to this little shop.
translation.de: Der kleine Laden ist mir wichtig.

translation.en: I understand.
You know where to find me if you change your mind.
translation.de: Du weißt, wo du mich findest, falls sich was ändert.

translation.en: Oh. Sorry. A little something in my throat. One second, I have your order.
translation.de: Tut mir leid. Ich habe etwas im Hals. Eine Sekunde, ich hole die Bestellung.

translation.en: -Surprise! -Oh, my goodness!
You're supposed to be in Europe! What are you doing here?
translation.de: Du bist doch in Europa. Was machst du hier?

translation.en: [Megan] I got your email and I wanted to surprise you!
-Uncle Jake helped me with the ticket. -That was so nice of him.
translation.de: -Onkel Jake half beim Ticket. -Wie nett von ihm.

translation.en: -I have to fly back on Monday, but-- -I'm so happy you're here!
translation.de: -Ich fliege Montag zurück… -Ich freue mich so.

translation.en: Megan, this is Brooks, my business partner.
translation.de: Megan, das ist Brooks, mein Geschäftspartner.

translation.en: -Brooks, this is my daughter Megan. -I've heard so much about you.
translation.de: -Brooks, meine Tochter Megan. -Ich hörte viel von dir.

translation.en: Yeah, same here.
I've missed this.
I haven't been home for Winterfest in years.
translation.de: Ich war ewig nicht zum Winterfest hier.

translation.en: Well, that is the nice thing about traditions.
translation.de: Das ist das Schöne an Traditionen.

translation.en: You can always come back to them.
translation.de: Man kann immer zurück zu ihnen.

translation.en: But I do worry about you,
especially with Uncle Jake and Ophelia and me so far away.
translation.de: da Onkel Jake und Ophelia und ich so weit weg leben.

translation.en: I'll be fine, I'll figure it out.
Aren't you always telling me
communication is the most important thing in any relationship?
translation.de: dass Kommunikation das Wichtigste in jeder Beziehung ist?

translation.en: Well… things are a little more complicated with good old Brooks.
translation.de: Nun, beim guten alten Brooks ist es etwas komplizierter.

translation.en: Only if you let it be.
When did you get so smart? I get it from my mom. [chuckles]
translation.de: -Seit wann bist du so weise? -Habe ich von meiner Mom.

translation.en: I see a couple friends I want to say hi to.
translation.de: Ich möchte ein paar Freunde grüßen.

translation.en: Oh, okay. And here's our raffle ticket. Let me know if we win anything.
translation.de: Ok, unser Tombolaticket. Sag mir, ob wir was gewinnen.

translation.en: -You got it. -Love you.
[Megan] Love you.
Hi. Hope I didn't interrupt.
No, she just wanted to say hi to some friends.
translation.de: Nein, sie will alte Freunde begrüßen.

translation.en: Um, I'm told that it's a tradition here at Winterfest
for partners to dance.
Would you dance with me?
If you don't tell me what the problem is, I don't know how to fix it.
translation.de: Wenn du nicht sagst, was los ist, kann ich es nicht klären.

translation.en: I just had my whole life turned upside down.
So if you and the pretty headhunter are going to leave me in the lurch,
translation.de: Wenn du und die hübsche Headhunterin mich im Stich lassen wollt,

translation.en: I'd rather know sooner than later.
translation.de: würde ich es gerne bald wissen.

translation.en: I knew it.
No, wait. Let me explain.
translation.de: Nein, warte. Lass es mich erklären.

translation.en: You asked why I bought Jake out.
translation.de: Du fragtest, wieso ich Jake auszahlte.

translation.en: And I just didn't tell you everything.
translation.de: Ich habe dir nicht alles erzählt.

translation.en: When I was in New York, I was engaged.
translation.de: Ich war verlobt in New York.

translation.en: And the relationship wasn't perfect, but I was dedicated to it,
translation.de: Die Beziehung war nicht perfekt, aber ich gab alles,

translation.en: until I discovered that the woman that I was with,
translation.de: bis ich erkannte, dass diese Frau

translation.en: she wasn't the woman that she said she was at all.
translation.de: nicht die Frau war, die sie vorgab.

translation.en: It was just…
it was utterly humiliating
to know that the person I trusted most in the world, she…
translation.de: dass die Person, der ich blind vertraute…

translation.en: she betrayed me, in more ways than one.
translation.de: Sie hinterging mich, auf vielerlei Weise.

translation.en: And then the fallout, professionally and personally, it just…
translation.de: Und dann das berufliche und persönliche Desaster…

translation.en: Brooks, I am so sorry. I had no idea. So that's why you left New York.
translation.de: Es tut mir so leid. Ich war ahnungslos. Daher verließt du New York.

translation.en: I just started re-evaluating my life, my career choices,
translation.de: Ich überdachte mein Leben neu, meine Berufswahl,

translation.en: just everything.
And I decided that I wanted to make a clean break from that world.
translation.de: Und ich wollte mich von dieser Welt abgrenzen.

translation.en: That's right when your brother called me.
What about this new business opportunity with Erin?
translation.de: Und die neue Geschäftssache mit Erin?

translation.en: I said no. I don't want to go back into that world.
translation.de: Ich lehnte ab. Ich will nicht zurück in diese Welt.

translation.en: Are you sure this is what you want?
Yep.
That chapter of my life is closed.
It's finished.
And I'm very excited to be writing this new chapter with you, together.
translation.de: Und ich freue mich auf dieses neue Kapitel mit dir zusammen.

translation.en: Thanks.
Oh. Adam, hi!
I didn't see you earlier. Oh, let me find your order.
translation.de: Ich sah dich vorher nicht. Ich hole deine Bestellung.

translation.en: I finally managed to escape the restaurant.
No. It's for you.
As are these.
They're beautiful. My favorites, how did you know?
translation.de: Sie sind wunderschön. Meine Liebsten, woher wusstest du das?

translation.en: I was hoping we could have dinner this week?
It'll be nice letting someone else cook for once.
translation.de: Dann kocht endlich mal ein anderer.

translation.en: I'd like that a lot.
Well, I gotta get back to the Eatery.
translation.de: Ok, ich muss zurück zum Eatery.

translation.en: I'm not complaining about being busy, but…
translation.de: Ich habe gerne viel zu tun, aber…

translation.en: I understand.
Thanks again for these.
You're welcome.
Hi. Sorry.
I…
I think we should probably get back to the booth.
translation.de: Wir sollten wohl zurück zum Stand.

translation.en: Sure.
-How's it going? -Oh, good. Better than ever.
translation.de: -Wie läuft es? -Gut. Besser als je zuvor.

translation.en: -We thought you could use a break. -Thanks.
Do we have more chocolate peanut butter fudge? We're out.
Yes. I made a extra batch this morning. It's at the shop.
translation.de: Ja. Ich machte heute früh mehr. Es steht im Laden.

translation.en: -I'll get it. I'll be right back. -[Kerrie] Thank you.
You two looked pretty cozy out on the dance floor.
translation.de: Ihr kamt euch recht nah beim Tanzen.

translation.en: Oh, it's a Winterfest tradition.
Business partners have to dance at least one dance together.
These are some nice flowers. Where did they come from?
translation.de: Die Blumen sind hübsch. Wo kommen die her?

translation.en: David, give these to your grandmother. They are her favorite.
translation.de: David, gib die deiner Großmutter. Ihre Favoriten.

translation.en: -Thanks. -Kerrie!
-Oh, Tim! -Do you have a minute?
-Sure. -I've been meaning to call.
I did a little digging and the paperwork was signed.
translation.de: Ich prüfte es nach, es war alles unterschrieben.

translation.en: It was just filed incorrectly.
So, your loan has been approved.
Congratulations!
Now you can buy out your obnoxious, controlling egoist of a business partner.
translation.de: Sie können den widerlichen, egoistischen Kontrollfreak-Partner auszahlen.

translation.en: You're free.
Congratulations.
I acted impulsively because I was upset about something.
translation.de: Ich agierte impulsiv, weil ich verärgert war.

translation.en: I'm sorry, Tim, but I'm not gonna need that loan.
translation.de: Tut mir leid, Tim. Ich brauche den Kredit nicht.

translation.en: Things with my new business partner are better than I could have dreamed.
translation.de: Es läuft besser, als ich es mir erträumen könnte.

translation.en: -Again, I'm sorry for the inconvenience. -No worries.
I'm glad to hear it.
Come by the booth for some peanut chocolate butter fudge.
translation.de: Holen Sie sich am Stand Erdnuss-Schoko-Fudge.

translation.en: On the house.
I'll gladly take you up on that.
Hey, Erin, it's Brooks. Hey, I had a bit of a change of heart.
translation.de: Hey, Erin, hier Brooks. Ich änderte meine Meinung.

translation.en: I'm wondering if you could set up that interview for me.
Call me back, let me know. Thank you.
[Megan] Mom! You won!
-What? I never win anything. -Well, you did this time.
translation.de: -Was? Ich gewinne sonst nie was. -Diesmal schon.

translation.en: Open it!
Are you kidding?
Seriously?
It's meant to be.
A couple friends are getting together at Izzy's house.
translation.de: Ein paar Freunde gehen zu Izzy.

translation.en: -Do you mind? -Go, have a good time.
Okay, thank you.
-Love you. -Love you too.
-See ya, Alexandra. -See ya, honey.
Did Brooks say when he would be coming back?
He didn't. Just said he had some calls to return.
-Hi. Here's your coffee. -Oh, thanks.
Have you seen Brooks?
I looked for him after Winterfest last night and he hasn't returned my messages.
translation.de: Ich suchte ihn gestern nach dem Fest, und er antwortet mir nicht.

translation.en: It's not like him.
I haven't seen him since he dropped off the fudge at the booth.
translation.de: Ich sah ihn zuletzt, als er das Fudge brachte.

translation.en: You know what… I'm starting to worry.
Maybe he just lost his phone.
Yeah. Well, whatever. I hope he's okay.
translation.de: Ja. Ich hoffe, es geht ihm gut.

translation.en: Still no response.
What's so urgent that you had to interrupt bingo?
translation.de: Was ist so dringend, dass du Bingo störst?

translation.en: I was winning.
Do you remember that big offer I told you about?
translation.de: Erinnerst du dich an das Megaangebot?

translation.en: -The one you can't turn down? -Yeah, that's the one.
And the main campus is in California, so get your surfboard ready.
translation.de: Die Zentrale ist in Kalifornien, pack dein Surfboard ein.

translation.en: Well.
I thought things were going pretty well? You and Kerrie seemed to be hitting it off.
translation.de: Ich dachte, hier lief es gut. Du und Kerrie verstandet euch so gut.

translation.en: Am I wrong?
No. No, I was.
I thought you wanted to move to the Golden State? I kinda like living in the Buckeye State.
translation.de: -Du wolltest doch in den Golden State? -Mir gefällt der Buckeye State.

translation.en: What happened?
I don't know, Dad. Just wrong about a woman again.
translation.de: Ich weiß nicht, Dad. Ich irrte mich wieder bei einer Frau.

translation.en: Anyway, listen, if you want to stay here,
there's offices in Cincinnati that I can work out of.
translation.de: kann ich auch im Büro in Cincinnati arbeiten.

translation.en: I'll make sure everything's taken care of.
No, I go where you go.
I've had a great life.
Your happiness is what matters to me.
translation.de: Alleine dein Glück zählt für mich.

translation.en: Thanks. I love you, Dad.
You don't look very happy.
As a matter of fact, you look downright miserable.
You wanna talk about it?
No, not really. No.
You've got to remember that Kerrie isn't Sierra.
translation.de: Denk dran, dass Kerrie nicht Sierra ist.

translation.en: I gotta go to Cincinnati, sign these papers. I'll be back in a few hours.
translation.de: Ich muss in Cincinnati was unterzeichnen. Dauert nur wenige Stunden.

translation.en: Let me know, I'll be ready to go.
So, how was Winterfest?
We nearly doubled what we made last year.
translation.de: Fast doppelt so viel wie letztes Jahr.

translation.en: I told you Brooks was a financial genius.
translation.de: Ich sagte ja, Brooks ist ein Finanzgenie.

translation.en: And, how are things going with him?
translation.de: Und wie läuft es so mit ihm?

translation.en: Good, great.
We sorted out the job thing and now everything's perfect.
translation.de: Wir klärten die Jobsache, jetzt ist alles perfekt.

translation.en: I had a feeling you two would hit it off.
translation.de: Ich wusste, ihr zwei versteht euch.

translation.en: Yeah. I just don't know where he is right now.
translation.de: Ja. Aber ich weiß gerade nicht, wo er ist.

translation.en: -Any sign of Brooks? -No.
He's never been this late before.
translation.de: So spät kam er noch nie.

translation.en: Okay, that's it.
Something is not right.
Where are you going?
Well, I'll tell you where I'm going.
translation.de: Nun, ich sage dir, wohin ich gehe.

translation.en: I am going to break out of my fortress and get some answers,
translation.de: Ich breche aus meiner Festung aus und hole mir Antworten,

translation.en: no matter what they might be, that's where I'm going.
translation.de: ganz gleich, wie sie ausfallen. Dahin gehe ich.

translation.en: Yes, girl.
Kerrie! What a nice surprise. What brings you here?
translation.de: Kerrie! Welch nette Überraschung. Was führt Sie hierher?

translation.en: I thought everyone might need a break from all that candy.
translation.de: Ich denke, alle brauchen eine Süßes-Pause.

translation.en: Is Brooks here? No. Sorry.
-Papa Joel, do you have a minute? -For you, absolutely.
translation.de: -Papa Joel, haben Sie eine Minute? -Für Sie? Na klar.

translation.en: -Sit down. -Thank you.
I'm gonna miss these snowy winter days.
Not to worry, you still have a few more months of snowy weather.
translation.de: Keine Sorge, Ihnen stehen noch Monate Schnee bevor.

translation.en: Not where I'm moving.
You're moving?!
Yeah, didn't Brooks mention anything to you?
No, he did not.
Well, I don't think it's my place to…
He's in Cincinnati at a business meeting,
translation.de: Er ist in Cincinnati bei einem Geschäftstermin,

translation.en: and if all goes well, we'll be relocating to California.
translation.de: und wenn es gut läuft, ziehen wir nach Kalifornien um.

translation.en: By the sounds of it, pretty soon too.
I don't understand.
Look, I don't know what happened between you two,
translation.de: Ich weiß nicht, was zwischen euch vorgefallen ist,

translation.en: but there's one thing I do know…
when you get to my age, you won't regret the chances you took for love,
translation.de: In meinem Alter bereut man nicht die Chancen auf Liebe,

translation.en: only the ones you let pass you by.
translation.de: sondern die, die man nicht ergriff.

translation.en: Do you know when he'll be back?
-Late afternoon. -Thank you.
Oh, and… please don't tell him we talked.
translation.de: Oh, und… Sagen Sie ihm nichts von unserem Gespräch.

translation.en: I won't.
I want you to know…
I'm rooting for you.
Me too.
The only thing that's missing from this is your signature.
translation.de: Hier fehlt dann nur noch deine Unterschrift.

translation.en: If you don't like the California campus, you can always work from here.
translation.de: Gefällt dir Kalifornien nicht, kannst du hier arbeiten.

translation.en: No, no. My dad's stoked for the sun and surf.
translation.de: Nein. Mein Dad freut sich auf Sonne und Wellen.

translation.en: I don't blame him.
-You're lucky to have him. -I am.
I've worked so hard my whole life, sacrificed everything to be successful.
translation.de: Ich habe nur gearbeitet und alles geopfert für den Erfolg.

translation.en: I think you and I are two of a kind.
These are from a client. Have one.
translation.de: Die sind von einem Kunden. Greif zu.

translation.en: Thank you.
What should I do with this?
Regift it?
It's starting to grow on me. [chuckles]
-[phone buzzing] -Oh, excuse me.
How did you find me?
-Papa Joel. -Oh, yeah. Should have guessed.
-Can we talk? -No, I don't think so.
I'm so sorry that this didn't work out, but…
translation.de: Mir tut leid, dass es nicht funktionierte, aber…

translation.en: I will sign any papers that you have.
Brooks, what are you talking about?
I'm talking about the loan documents.
Unfortunately for you, I overheard you talking to the bank manager.
translation.de: Leider hörte ich dein Gespräch mit dem Bankdirektor.

translation.en: So, please, don't worry. I'm not going to cause any problems.
translation.de: Keine Sorge, ich mache keinen Ärger.

translation.en: Brooks, is that what you thought?
That I would confront you about leaving me in the lurch
translation.de: Dass ich dich rüge, weil du mich im Stich lässt,

translation.en: and go behind your back and get a secret loan to buy you out of the business?
translation.de: und dann zahle ich dich mit einem Kredit einfach aus?

translation.en: I told Tim I don't want the loan.
translation.de: Ich sagte Tim, ich will keinen Kredit.

translation.en: I had him cancel it.
Yes, at first I did want it, but…
that was before I got to know you.
translation.de: Da kannte ich dich noch nicht.

translation.en: I had the contract in my hand… and I couldn't sign it.
translation.de: Ich hielt den Vertrag in der Hand… und konnte nicht unterschreiben.

translation.en: -You didn't sign it? -No.
Why not?
It's because this restlessness that has driven me my whole life
translation.de: Diese Unruhe, die mich mein Leben lang antrieb,

translation.en: from place to place…
it's not here anymore.
It's gone.
Since I met you.
I guess I'm changing.
Well…
"Life is for the living, but…
he who's living must be prepared for changes."
translation.de: und der Lebende muss Veränderungen annehmen."

translation.en: Is that my high-school yearbook quote?
What about you? Why didn't you take the loan? What changed your mind?
translation.de: Was ist mit dir? Wieso kein Kredit? Was änderte deine Meinung?

translation.en: Well, I might have fallen in love with you.
translation.de: Nun, ich habe mich wohl in dich verliebt.

translation.en: You might have?
I have fallen in love with you.
And it's wonderful and terrifying because you know how I feel about change.
translation.de: Und es ist wundervoll und erschreckend. Du weißt ja, wie ich Veränderungen finde.

translation.en: But I had to come and tell you. And honestly, if you don't feel the same way, it's…
translation.de: Aber ich musste es dir sagen. Und falls du anders empfindest, dann…

translation.en: -I like it. -Me too.
I got something for you.
-What? -It's a surprise.
-[gasps] Two tickets to Belgium?! -That's right.
We're going back to the very little village
translation.de: Wir reisen in das kleine Dorf,

translation.en: that your great grandparents learned to make candy.
translation.de: in dem deine Urgroßeltern alles lernten.

translation.en: Then we're going to see Jake and Ophelia and, of course, Megan.
translation.de: Dann treffen wir Jake und Ophelia und natürlich Megan.

translation.en: I love you, Brooks McLead.
-I love you too, Bean. -[giggles]
